short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a table of all your Zwift workout activity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Zwift feed page (zwift.com/feed) is a great record of all your workouts, but did you ever want to get the workout information into a spreadsheet? 

This extension scrolls through your workout history and grabs the date, duration, distance, elevation gain, and calories from each item in your Zwift feed. 

It also calculates your average watts for each item using the calories burned and time values (assumes 25% efficiency).

You can view the table of extracted workout data in the extension, and you can copy it to the clipboard using the button provided. Once it's on the clipboard, you can paste it into any spreadsheet app and then perform additional graphing and analysis.

Free and easy to use! A gift to the Zwifting community. Ride on!
